column2: Improved infrastructure makes supplying armies easier.
column6: La mejora de infraestructuras facilita el suministro al ejército.

column2: Immortals will never succumb to old age, but they can still die from other causes.
column6: Los inmortales nunca sucumben a la edad, aunque pueden morir por otras causas.

column2: Ignore the man behind the curtain
We're defending against a holy war. Everyone is doing what they can to fend off the invaders.
column3: We're defending against a holy war. Everyone is doing what they can to fend of the invaders.
column4: We're defending against a holy war. Everyone is doing what they can to fend of the invaders.
column6: Nos defendemos de una guerra santa. Todo el mundo hace lo que puede para rechazar al invasor.

column2: We're rather disorganized at the moment.
column4: We're rather disorganized at the moment.
column6: Estamos algo desorganizados en este momento
column9: We're rather disorganized at the moment.

column2: Our decadence is low, making everyone like us more.
column6: Tenemos poca decadencia, lo que hace que gustemos más a todo el mundo.

column2: We are decadent and many are therefore questioning our legitimate rule
column6: Somos decadentes y por tanto algunos empiezan a cuestionarse la legitimidad de nuestro gobierno.

column2: We are highly decadent and many are therefore questioning our legitimate rule
column6: Somos muy decadentes y la mayoría se cuestiona la legitimidad de nuestro gobierno.
Espera de revocación de ley de la corona

column2: Crown authority laws were recently revoked due to a faction ultimatum or revolt. It will take time before the realm's nobles are willing to support the revocation of their remaining laws.
column6: Las leyes de la corona han sido recientemente modificadas por la fuerza. Pasará un tiempo antes de que los nobles se vuelvan a unir en una facción.

column2: §Y[This.GetTitledFirstName]§!'s realm enters a crown law revocation cooldown period.\n
column6: El reino de §Y[This.GetTitledFirstName]§! entra en un periodo de espera de revocación de leyes de la corona.\n

column2: §Y[This.GetBestName]§! won't be able to declare holy war for another §Y5 years§!.\n
column6: §Y[This.GetBestName]§! No podrá declarar otra guerra santa en §Y5 años§!.\n

column2: §Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§! takes or vassalizes all titles in the §Y[This.GetFullBaseName]§! belonging to §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§!.\n
column3: §Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§! capture tous les territoires occupés.\n§Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§! prend ou vassalise tous les titres du §Y[This.GetFullBaseName]§! appartenant à §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§!.\n
column4: §Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§! nimmt alles besetzte Land in Besitz.\n§Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§! übernimmt oder vasallisiert alle Titel in §Y[This.GetFullBaseName]§!, die zu §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§! gehören.\n
column6: §Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§! toma o avasalla todos los títulos en el §Y[This.GetFullBaseName]§! que pertenezcan a  §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§!.\n

column2: §Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§! gains the §Y[This.GetFullBaseName]§!.\nIf §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§! becomes a vassal of §Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§!, §Y[From.GetSheHe]§! will be imprisoned.\n
column6: §Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§! logra el §Y[This.GetFullBaseName]§!.\nIf §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§! se convierte en vasallo de §Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§!, §Y[From.GetSheHe]§! será encarcelado.\n

column2:
§Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§! takes all occupied territory.
§Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§! takes or vassalizes all titles in the §Y[This.GetFullBaseName]§! belonging to §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§!.
If §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§! becomes a vassal of §Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§!, §Y[From.GetSheHe]§! will be imprisoned.
The [Root.Culture.GetName] host will permanently settle throughout the §Y[This.GetFullBaseName]§!, convert the dominant culture and religion in one province, and fully replenish the levies of settlements throughout the new realm with their own.
column6:
§Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§! toma todos los territorios ocupados.
§Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§! toma o avasalla todos los títulos en el §Y[This.GetFullBaseName]§! que pertenezcan a §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§!.
If §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§! Se convierte en vasallo de §Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§!, §Y[From.GetSheHe]§! será encarcelado(a).
La hueste [Root.Culture.GetName] se asentará permanentemente en §Y[This.GetFullBaseName]§!, convierte la cultura y religión en una provincia, y reforzará las levas de los asentamientos con sus tropas.
